channel.title: Need help with emote teleports
channel.description: Ok i have created a wildy spot and now i need to delete the "pk" link on the emote list and change the tele cords to the new pk place can anyone help me out and tell me how to delete emote's and make a tele cmote button and call it "pk"

item.title: Need help with emote teleports
item.dc:creator: @pkforlol3 pkforlol3
item.description:
@pkforlol3 wrote:

under the emote u added, like i got this:

		case 168:
			// yes emote
			if (emotes == 0) {
				emotes = 1;
				pEmote = 0x357;
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
			} else {
				emotes = 0;
				pEmote = playerSE;
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
			}
			break;

i made this:

		case 168:
			// KBD LAIR
			if (emotes == 0) {
				emotes = 1;
				pEmote = 0x357;
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
			} else {
				emotes = 0;
				pEmote = playerSE;
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

                                                      X = COORD;
                                                      Y = COORD;
                                                      H = Height;
			}
			break;

Read full topic
